entry.title: Russia Offers Mixed Messages on Ukraine Troop Pullback
entry.content: Vladimir Putin said Russia had withdrawn some troops from the Ukrainian border and was open to renewed talks to end a standoff with the West, but President Biden said the U.S. hasn’t verified that Moscow pulled back troops.

entry.title: Thousands of Ukraine Soldiers Have Already Died in a War Started When They Were Boys
entry.content: Russia and its gathered forces threaten what looks like a new conflict, but the Ukraine military has been fighting it for eight years. “We’ve been stewing in this war for so long.”
